name: TechFlow Solutions
description: A complete digital transformation for a leading SaaS company, including rebrand, website redesign, and marketing strategy.

challenges.problem: TechFlow was struggling with an outdated brand identity and a website that failed to communicate their innovative solutions. Their conversion rates were low, and they were losing market share to more modern competitors.
challenges.solution: We developed a comprehensive rebrand strategy, including a new visual identity that reflects their innovative approach. The new website features clear messaging, intuitive navigation, and strategic conversion points that guide visitors through the sales funnel.

key_takeaways: 150% increase in qualified leads within first quarter
Brand recognition improved by 200% in target market
Website conversion rate increased from 1.2% to 4.8%
Average session duration increased by 65%

name: Artisan Coffee Co.
description: E-commerce platform and brand identity for a specialty coffee roaster expanding their online presence.

challenges.problem: Artisan Coffee had a loyal local following but struggled to translate their in-store experience to online sales. Their existing website was slow, difficult to navigate, and didn't capture the premium nature of their products.
challenges.solution: We created a beautiful, fast-loading e-commerce platform with rich product photography, detailed origin stories for each coffee, and a subscription model. The brand identity was refreshed to feel premium while maintaining its artisanal roots.

key_takeaways: Online sales increased by 340% in six months
Subscription program grew to 2,000+ active members
Cart abandonment rate reduced by 45%
Mobile conversion rate improved by 180%

name: Urban Fitness Hub
description: Digital marketing campaign and social media strategy for a boutique fitness studio chain.

challenges.problem: Urban Fitness Hub was opening new locations but struggling to build awareness and attract new members. Their social media presence was inconsistent, and they had no clear marketing strategy.
challenges.solution: We developed a comprehensive social media strategy with engaging content, influencer partnerships, and targeted advertising. A content calendar ensures consistent posting, while paid campaigns drive membership sign-ups.

key_takeaways: Social media following grew from 5K to 45K in 6 months
Cost per lead reduced by 60%
New member sign-ups increased by 125%
Community engagement rate reached 8.5%

name: GreenLeaf Architecture
description: Complete website redesign showcasing sustainable architecture projects with immersive visual experiences.

challenges.problem: GreenLeaf's portfolio of stunning sustainable buildings wasn't being properly showcased online. Their website felt dated, loaded slowly, and failed to convey their expertise in eco-friendly architecture.
challenges.solution: We designed an immersive, visually-driven website that lets the work speak for itself. High-quality imagery, smooth transitions, and thoughtful micro-interactions create an experience that matches the quality of their architecture.

key_takeaways: Inquiries from high-value clients increased by 85%
Average time on site increased by 120%
Bounce rate decreased by 40%
Ranked #1 for 'sustainable architecture firm' in local SEO

name: FinanceFirst App
description: UI/UX design and development for a personal finance management mobile application.

challenges.problem: FinanceFirst had a powerful budgeting tool but users found it confusing and overwhelming. User retention was low, and the app store reviews highlighted UX issues.
challenges.solution: We completely redesigned the user experience with a focus on simplicity and clarity. The new design uses progressive disclosure to present complex features in digestible steps, with delightful animations that make managing money feel less stressful.

key_takeaways: User retention improved by 200%
App store rating increased from 3.2 to 4.8 stars
Daily active users grew by 150%
Feature adoption rate increased by 80%

name: Nordic Home Interiors
description: Brand identity and e-commerce platform for a Scandinavian-inspired furniture retailer.

challenges.problem: Nordic Home was a new entrant in a competitive market, struggling to differentiate from established players. They needed a brand identity and online presence that would resonate with design-conscious consumers.
challenges.solution: We created a minimalist, elegant brand identity that embodies Scandinavian design principles. The e-commerce platform features beautiful product photography, AR room visualization, and a seamless checkout experience.

key_takeaways: Achieved profitability within 8 months of launch
Customer acquisition cost 35% below industry average
Average order value of $580
40% of customers return for repeat purchases
